subject: Order Number SSN1696
description_text:
Hello! I was hoping to change the shipping to express. I haven’t seen the
order be fulfilled and was hoping there was an update!

Best

Blair

conversations.body_text: 你好，布莱尔·亚历山大，  好的，我们的运营团队将与您联系，了解如何进行更新。
Hi Blair Alexander,     Hello, your parcel has been sent out, tomorrow will update the international logistics number for you, is expected to be around the 15th for your delivery.

Okay great!

Thanks for the update and awesome service

On Wed 11 Jun 2025 at 10:11, service@simsonn.com
